name: Pacific Skies Aviation
about: Pacific Skies Aviation, based at Torrance Municipal Airport in Southern California, offers comprehensive flight training for pilots of all skill levels. Our programs include private pilot, instrument, commercial, and multi-engine ratings, as well as certifications for flight instructors. We utilize a customized, practical syllabus that ensures methodical and safe training, with regular stage checks by senior instructors to ensure progress. Our fleet includes advanced aircraft such as the Cessna 172-S, Cessna 182 Turbo RG, and Cirrus SR-22 Turbo, along with a full-motion flight simulator. Our modern facility features a VIP pilotâ€™s lounge, seminar rooms, and a picnic patio, providing a comfortable and supportive learning environment. With a focus on standardization and maintenance, we ensure seamless training and well-maintained aircraft. Pacific Skies Aviation is dedicated to providing a thorough and enjoyable flight training experience.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
